education.institution: National Institute of Applied Science and Technology

experience.title: Research And Development Engineer
experience.description: Developed the backend of 2 healthcare platforms: Doctor Portal (web app) and Patient Portal (mobile app) using Flask (Data stored on Google Cloud Platform with FHIR-compliant structures.) [cite: 3] Collaborated in the development of a system to extract and convert healthcare documents into FHIR bundles using Google Gemini, then enriching FHIR resources with SNOMED codes Developed 2 Flask-based backend portals (Doctor and Patient Portals) helping doctors recommend treatment for patients suffering from diabetes type-2. [cite: 3] Stored patients consent decisions on blockchain. [cite: 4] Designed a consent-aware search engine to display only authorized patient data. [cite: 4] Stored data in MongoDB (encrypted and in OpenEHR format). [cite: 5] Developed the backend of a conversational chatbot utilizing OpenAl's GPT-4 Turbo model. [cite: 5]

experience.title: Machine Learning Intern
experience.description: Developed a Deep Learning CNN based model to adjust rotated scanned documents using Keras. [cite: 6] Developed a web app using Streamlit to easily label the right deviation angle of scanned documents (manually labeling 1248 images). [cite: 7]
